translation: Thou lickest up, devouring all the worlds on every side with Thy flaming mouths. Thy fierce rays, filling the whole world with radiance, burn, O Vishnu!
commentary: 11.30 Lelihyse (Thou) likest? Devouring devouring? from all sides on every side? Lokan the worlds? The whole thing all? Vadanaiḥ with mouths? flaming with flames? Tejobhiḥ with radiance? Apurya filling? Jagat the world? the whole the whole? Bhasa: rays? Your Thy? Fierce: fierce? pratapanti are burning? Vishnu O VishnuCommentary Vishnu means allpervading? Vyapanasila.
